activities.loc: MDB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Connie A Schmidt

records.addlTxt: Exhibit 1 - Copy of photo of Maverick cigarette package - State's - Received.

4:16 PM Defendant Connie A Schmidt in court.  Attorney Laura Ann Sutton in court for Connie A Schmidt.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court Reporter appears by zoom.

4:16  Court relates and gives appearances.
4:16  Officer Torey Belich called, sworn, direct by State.  Defendant identifies defendant.
State offers Exhibit #1 - Photo of Maverick cigarette package found in car - received.
4:23  Cross by Atty. Sutton.
4:27  State moves for bind-over.
4:28  Court finds probable cause; bound over.
Arraignment set; must appear in person.
Bond to continue.
Arraignment scheduled for November 11, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on August 22, 2022 at 04:15 pm.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: $100.00/month to begin 9/17/2022 for repayment to Attorney Laura Sutton.
Attorney fees.  Laura Sutton appointed.  Repay $100.00 per month starting 09/17/2022.

11:38 AM Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Connie A Schmidt in court. Dean Form filed with court.  Court appoints Attorney Laura Sutton as counsel to be repaid at the rate of $100.00 per month to begin 9/17/2022. Preliminary hearing requested.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 04:15 pm.
OSPD Appointment of Counsel Report - No attorney appointed

11:23 AM Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Connie A Schmidt in court.  Attorney Michael Steuer appears by video for today.
Qualifies for Public Defender but counsel has not been appointed yet.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473.

1:07 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Connie A Schmidt appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Alex Kitto appeared for today by video for Connie A Schmidt. 

Defense acknowledge receipt of complaint.
Address and phone numbers confirmed.
Defendant must call the public defender's office today to determine eligibility.  If the defendant does not qualify for public defender representation, the defendant must complete a Petition for Appointment of an Attorney, Affidavit of Indigency also known as the blue form in order for the court to consider appointing an attorney. 
AIA set; must appear in person.

(Bond and MS scanned to jail)
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 10, 2022 at 10:00 am.
